mapper.insert: insert into schedule (schedule_id, member_id, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_start, schedule_end) values(schedule_seq.nextVal,#{member_id} ,#{schedule_title}, #{schedule_content}, #{schedule_start, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{schedule_end, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT S.*, M.place, M.address FROM schedule S left outer join map M on S.schedule_id = M.schedule_id WHERE S.member_id = #{member_id} and to_char(schedule_start, 'yyyyMMdd') = #{date} ORDER BY S.schedule_start ASC, S.schedule_end ASC, S.schedule_id ASC
